name: Slumber Party Spectacular!!!
description:
Slumber party time! In this text based game, you play as sixteen year old Audrey Davis. After circumstances require her to move to a new high school at the start of her senior year, Audrey is surprised to find herself invited to a sleepover at popular girl Jessica's house. But I'm sure it will be tons of fun, and nobody will be in horrible danger!

Made during Global Game Jam 2016. Theme: ritual.
